Phobia looks at the remaining Predacons and the Alliance member accompanying
them "Bludgeon gave us the OK, lets go check out these new preds."
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 21, 2000 12:05 PM
Subject: Re: ARK


>
> OOC: I got Lady Hawk thinking of Hurricane as a pee-on, but i didnt catch
> orders from Phobia.  I'll do the best i can
>
> :::Andromeda/Bluestreak/Bludgeon/Treadshot:::
>
> ::They think for a while::
> Bluestreak: I say we first get some help at the CF.  Though it may be the
> case that the best warriors are out finding Dinobot and Tavatron, We need
> better numbers.  What do ya think?
> Andromeda: I like it.  What about you SnowCat?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Bludgeon looks around.  he transforms to Rhino mode and sniffs a bit::
> Bludgeon: All clear Phobia.
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Treadshot dodges 1 mega flare but gets hit by another, though his tank
mode
> supports him and his armor takes the full brunt of the blow.  he lobs 2
> missles at Inu-Yasha::
>
>
>
